ApplicationStageDefinition.name: ApplicationStageDefinition
ApplicationStageDefinition.description: Represents a stage of an application.

Description.description: The description of the application stage definition.

EditTypeAppRenderMethodId.description: The render method for an editable form or application that's associated with this application stage definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the application stage definition.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns the record.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the application stage definition.

ViewTypeAppRenderMethodId.description: The render method for a read-only form or application that's associated with this application stage definition.
